beschrijving: Hobos tripel, een limited edition Belgische tripel gebrouwen door Microbrouwerij Mølder & Coöp.Een zoete aroma en honing in de neus. Een kruidige smaak en een medium bitterheid zijn aanwezig
Bronskleurig bier met complexe aroma's
This beer is a 50% CIDER/ 50%LAMBIK STYLE blend
Eisbock van Mok Master
Imperial stout dry hopped with toasted coconut flakes. The real bounty taste.
3rd edition of our Fugu On Tour series. An IPA, but not just any IPA. This is a Triple IPA with a tasty blend of 2 New Zealand hops: Motueka...
Our flagship beer. Brewed in 2021 for the first time, the Fugushima is an explosion of Citra, Cryo Citra and Simcoe. It’s refreshing, easy to drink and full of exotic,...
This Pale Ale is our Belgian-Japanese connexion. We dry-hopped it with 2 different hops: Belgian harvested Chinook and the famous Japanese Sorachi Ace. We also used Chit malt.
Pear, lychee, apple and yuzu have been squeezed. Squizz was brewed. Fugu is happy.
Bourbon barrel aged & dry hopped sour ale. With this beer we were inspired by the famous words of Captain Kirk from Star Trek: to boldly go where no man has...
Black hole sun. Black Betty. Men in black. Paint it black. Black velvet. Back in black! Total blackout is our brand new imperial stout! 10 different malts, full bodied, dark...
The second beer in our SMASH HIT series: Single Malt, Single Hop IPA. This time we brewed it with Galaxy hops!

naam: Diva Divine BA Pineau Des Charentes (Za)
beschrijving: Extravagant Pilsner made even more extravagant by maturing it for 11 months in Pineau de Charentes barrels. In the scent you’ll find clearly tones of honey and eau-de-vie. I
Throw away your screens with their billions of useless photos, streams, movies and even more stupid gifs. Good riddance to social media, news, commercials, and all other redundant influences
We got together with our friends from Chain House Brewing Co to celebrate the simple things in life. Simpler things such as a Mild Ale. A Great British brew
Silver @ Dutch Beer Challenge 2020 & 2023 Golden liquid goodness! Creamy & smooth, extremely fruity by tons of late & dryhopping!
Vicaris tripel is an elegant balanced soft beer with a fruity touch. The beer is not overtly bitter nor too sweet wich makes it accessible for many beer lovers.
Vicaris Tripel/Gueuze is the perfect thirst-quencher for hot summer days. For this beer, brewery Dilewyns works together with a renowned gueuze brewer from the Zenne valley.
Is een bier op basis van onze Vicaris Tripel, verrijkt met een infusie van rum en extra eikensnippers. Dit resulteert in een mooi gebalanceerd, volmondig en krachtig blond bier
Lervig and Slowboat have gotten their minds in sync to create a modern era Juicy IPA brewed with true Kveik yeast from Ebbegarden farm in Stordal Norway

naam: Off the Rack Finnish Rye Whiskey Imperial Stout by Rackhouse
beschrijving: Introducing a robust masterpiece with a bold 16.7% ABV. This beer has been aged for 12 months in Finnish Rye Whiskey barrels, resulting in a symphony of deep flavors.
Tasty Juice is a double hopped India Pale Ale. It holds a massive tropical & dank flavours from the double load of Citra hops

Paragon 2022 brings together bourbon barrel-aged barley wine and masterfully expresses notes of dried figs, raisins, and vanilla, complemented by caramel, toffee, and chocolate notes from the malt. The result is a symphony of flavors that envelops your palate, disguising the alcohol content with finesse. It’s a testament to our dedication to the old style and the artistry of brewing, encapsulated in every bottle.
More than Double-Hopped With Citra. Supersonic is a double-hopped, Double India Pale Ale. With the amount of Citra hops used, expect some seriously tropical flavours in this can.
Another fallen angel from our Wine Side Story. Fermented together with rebula wine berries in Movia Lunar barrels.
In the crypt of a Kostanjevica monastery just a few kilometers from our brewery there is a thomb of the Bourbons
Abandon all hope, here comes the bitter end. Grim Reaper is here to take over your soul with a bomb of true hops
We complemented our gose beer with large quantities of mango and passion fruit. The result is a tropical fruit bomb. We called it Crux – the southern cross.
Cognac barrel aged
Wacky & Hoppy Belgian Witbier.
Dauw - Barrel-aged wild blond beer with elderflower. Once a year we brew a special blend for Dauw
Grondslag - Barrel-aged wild blonde ale Grondslag is a bière de coupage composed of our oldest and best barrels.
Wild winterbier met Stoofperen en Nederlandse specerijen

naam: Barrel Collab Series - Barely Barley Wine (Za)
beschrijving: Together with one of Holland's finest barrelmasters Kees we brewed a barley wine with barely any barley! Instead we used lots of oat, which makes the beer extraordinarily smooth
The first Dutch non alcoholic IPA. This non alcoholic IPA packs all the punch you expect from an IPA. However, you can still get behind the wheel after this one...
Get pumped with this non alcoholic coffee nitro stout! Make sure to pour this one hard to get the creamy nitrogen foam mustache we all love.
A can full of flavour and fun! Fun House is a fruity and tastefull non alcoholic New England IPA for everybody that loves to have fun.
Loveship, volgeladen met hop, neemt je mee op een smaakvol avontuur over de hoge zeeën van Ekuanot, Ekuanot Cryo, Mosaic incognito en Cryo Pop hop
We brew Hazy Weekend only on mondays when we're still a bit hazy from last weekend. Every batch is dryhopped with different kind of hops.
Broeders is a refreshing blonde beer with character from malted wheat and german hops. Broeders is best enjoyed with Broeders (mates/ brothers) at any time.
This beer has a thick body with a complex structure with a delicious lingering roastiness alongside a balanced sweet finish.
This beast of a NEIPA must be drunk FRESH! Brewed with rye, giving it a delicate bitter touch and a big dose of dry New Zealand hops for the exotic fruit...
Juicy Neipa layered with 3 aromatic hops. Nelson throughout the hot side and dry-hopped with limey Ekuanot followed by big stone fruit aromas from HBC 630.
Just Roll is a rye heavy refreshing porter made with a blend of roasted barley and rye combined with a light dosing of our own house made distilled clementines, ...
Light in color, body and soul, this Kölsch is a fine embodiment of the style, producing a crisp and slightly dry beer with a very easy malt character.
A delicately dry-hopped Berliner Weisse style beer with the added badassery of distilled bio lemon and lime zests.
Formerly known as Achel Blond Extra.
Formerly known as Achel 8° Blond. A pale, strong, fruity, hoppy Trappist ale from one of Belgium’s six official abbey breweries.
An exotic beer with the refreshing taste of coconut. Mongozo Buckwheat White forms the basis for this beer. A beer that is perfect for pairing with exotic dishes.
The sweet and refreshing flavour of fresh mangos. It is a light beer with a refreshing, fruity flavour.
Averbode Extra is een blond multigranenbier van hoge gisting dat door het gebruik van de unieke Averbode gist zijn typische aroma van kruiden en groene appel verkrijgt.
Golden blond, multigrain beer with a very persistent, lacing head. Scent: A complex smell, with a citrus aroma, followed by hop aromas such as Saaz, Brewers Gold and Amarillo.
Liberate your tastebuds with a mix of fruity hops, after they've been oppressed by a long cold winter. This delight will unleash thoughts of a sultry Indian summer night.
The allusion to pink elephants and the choice of names is not due to chance. With a particular character, the unique taste results from triple fermentation
Green colour, slightly cloudy because of the wheat beer. Dense, white head. We detect green lime and tequila. Very fresh mouthfeel, coming from the tequila.
It poured a dark brown color with an off-white head. The aroma was of malts, caramel, licorice and fruits. The taste was sweet and malty with some caramel, licorice, ...
Belgian Owl Whiskey Barrel Aged.
Summer edition of the Schuppenboer tripel dryhopped with Nelson Sauvin and Premiant.
Oerknal aged on whisky barrels from Het Anker.
Gouden Carolus Tripel was originally brewed for the Knights of the Golden Fleece in 1491. This golden specialty beer is brewed with the best Belgian ripe barley and hops, ...
Zoals het een baron betaamt, getuigt deze doordrinker van een onberispelijke smaak. Een puur pilsbier, ongefilterd en ongezouten, zoals een echte baron in het leven staat.
Klaar voor lancering? Het Batteliek 'drycoffee' experiment doet je reizen naar een ander universum. In dit donkere bier vind je een verrassend fruitige toets.
Onze kriek kan niet beschouwd worden als de standaard kriek. Eerst wordt er een tarwebier gemaakt. Dit wordt gedurende 3 maanden gelagerd op verse krieken.
Dit fris blond zomers biertje smaakt nog beter op een terras in het zonnetje! Door de gebruikte Saison gist en een stevige hop heeft dit biertje een aangenaam hoppig karakter.
Deze blonde trippel is een zoeter biertje dat vlot naar binnen gaat. Maar laat je niet verrassen door het stevige alcoholpercentage van 8,7%. Met koriander en appelsien.

naam: Gooische Grape Ale VII ROOD (Regent & Pinotin) (Za)
beschrijving: Een prachtige moutig bier met een belangrijke rode wijn toets. Grape Ale 7 is gebrouwen met Regent & Pinotin druif van het Betuws Wijndomein.
en sterk blond bier met champagne gist! De combinatie van de friszoete moutsmaak, de bloemige neus en de droge, champagne- achtige afdronk. Ongefiltreerd. Ongepasteuriseerd.
Het Beste Nederlandse Bier @ Brussels Beer Challenge Gooisch Rood is een ‘Red Lager’. Een doordrinkbaar, ondergistend, amberkleurig bier.
Fris bitter lentebier met lindebloesem.
'brunch.' - (you read that correctly, both lowercase and punctuated) is a Canadian take on a more traditional style: the framboise sour.
A Saison Apparent! This blend has received the thorough Brettanomyces treatment. The Saison style originated near the border of Southern Belgium and Northern France as a farmhouse style beer.

De Kromme Haring proudly presents our first non-alcoholic beer! We carefully re-designed the original Sand Diver Isotonic Ale, retaining its unique Haring vibe while (almost completely) eliminating the alcohol.
Barrel-aged Double Grisette We brewed this beer with Dave Janssen of Hors Catégorie brewing, our oceanographer/beer historian/home- brewer soulmate with a deep love of all things saison.
Brett porter.
Into the boat! Our favourite barbarian returns. "Barbarian Fishing, the OG of our NEIPA stable, is a big and bold double IPA.
This gluten-free Buckwheat IPA combines a traditional Dutch grist of barley, buckwheat and oats, with modern American hop varities Chinook and El Dorado.
Smoky Juniper Ale
WHITE SAISON

naam: Hobos Grote Hof Cognac Barrel Aged (Zo)

beschrijving: An American Pale Ale brewed with Target, Amarillo & Mosaic hops.
Volmondig maar goed doordrinkbaar bier. Licht wazig, zoete toetsen, licht fruitig, een lichte kruidigheid. evenwichtig. Smaakexplosie, schuimstabiliteit.
Een pittig blondje met een fruitig hop aroma's
Aged for 9 months in Cognac barrels
Belgian hop, unpasteurised, unfiltered, fermentation in the bottle.
Post Modern Farmhouse Ale DuDoRų
Dubbele IPA met nitro (stikstof) - Gebrouwen met gerstemout, haver en tarwe. We hopten het met Merkur, Simcoe en de experimentele variëteit YCH 303.
Did you know that the Fugu draws crop circles in the bottom of the sea in order to attract the female? At Fugu Brewing, we wanna catch the freshest hops.
Tobermory Barrel Aged Imperial Stout
Imperial Weizen. Or a barley wine made with 50% wheat and an original Weizen yeast....a Weizenwein! Silky smooth, dangerously drinkable. Ganz toll!
Hoppy Weizen
First time our 400 Volt sees bourbon barrels. Technically it’s not bourbon since Early Times whiskey, as it is marketed in the US, is aged for 3 years.
Cereal Tripel brewed with Camomille, Paradise seeds and Lemon zeste.
Quinto" is the italian name choosen for the fifth Vicaris beer. The name is a tribute to the italian brewery equipment and five is also the ABV.
Is een bier op basis van onze Vicaris Tripel, verrijkt met een infusie van rum en extra eikensnippers. Dit resulteert in een mooi gebalanceerd, volmondig en krachtig blond bier

naam: Patience For Eylenbosch - Belgian Pale Ale (Pale Ale Speciale) (Zo)

beschrijving: Brewed with Belgian record hops
This hoppy unfiltered pilsner is a refreshing and flavorful take on the classic style. The hops provide a burst of flavor and aroma that’s balanced by a clean malt character.
The first instalment of our 2024 collaboration series with long time friends, Brewski. A fruited sour with mango and vanilla fermented with Norwegian Kveik yeast.
A mixed fermentation sour brewed in collaboration with Nevel Wild Ales from the Netherlands. This Norwegian sour was brewed with locally foraged juniper and fermented with Kveik yeast.
Cooled in a coolship, then spontaneously fermented in old wine barrels. Zepar is a blend of old and young fractions with sour cherries.
What happens when a barrel gets too close to our Batch #50 Stout? It gets sucked in and a Black Hole #50 appears. This edition is especially exquisite.
Guess what! Sour sister has another sister: Hazy sister. We used the same ingredients as in our sour NEIPA, without the sour part. Hazy Sister is a juicy, fruity...
Here comes the Apocalypse. Its first rider is the Warrior. It is best to just surrender. This is a New World warrior, a true American pale ale. Dry, fruity, gently bitter...
Collaboration brew with Vleesmeester Brewery. We brewed a batch of Black Pudding and a batch of Naughty Russian and mixed it together in a fermentation tank. Lagered with vanilla beans,...
75% Bowmore & 25% rode wijn
Double IPA van 7,5% met een melkerige body door de voluptueuze hoeveelheden boekweit en haver in de moutstorting. Nadien keihard getrashd met Citra, Idaho 7 cryo, Azacca cryo, Talus, en...
It was time to brew again a West Coast IPA, for bitterness-lovers. This one contains Magnum, Citra, Centennial, Amarillo and Cascade hops...
With the name of the first granddaughter of brewer Geert, this beer stands for new life and love !
Misthoorn navigeert van een gezonde bodem tot een duurzaam bier, gebrouwen met lokale ingrediënten. Het graan is afkomstig van het Brouwbos Sellink in de Achterhoek.

naam: Barrel Collab Series - Triple Black IPA (Zo)
beschrijving: This crazy triple black IPA that we brewed together with Bronckhorster Brewing was already bitter and hoppy before it went into the cognac barrels, but we dryhopped it again.
Een prachtige combinatie tussen een Red Ale en een West Coast IPA vol met Amerikaanse hoppen en gesatureerd met stikstof!
Formerly known as Achel Extra Bruin (De 3 Wijzen).
Fresh, sweet and fruity banana flavour with a hint of beer in the aftertaste.
Colour and sight: Deep dark red colour, with a light pink, compact and lacing head. Scent: Soft fruity aroma, with hints of almond and mildly sour cherries. Flavour: Sweet and fruity.
Delirium Black is a Belgian Strong Dark Ale. It's a mix of Delirium Nocturnum & Delirium Christmas, which are aged for 9 months in Oak Buffalo Trace Bourbon Barrels.
The stronger 'Grand Cru' version of the Schuppenboer / Jack of Spades. 20,5°Plato & 40 EBU
Gouden Carolus Cuvée van de Keizer Imperial Dark was enriched by an infusion of Gouden Carolus Single Malt whisky.
Deze blonde Battelaar is een trouwe metgezel bij al jouw avonturen. Door de klassieke Duitse Tett nanger-hop smaakt dit bier lichtjes gekruid, volmondig en vooral heerlijk fris.
De Bèrringse Bier Brouwers zitten ondertussen aan hun 6de editie van de "CHEF-PRION". De versie van 2023 is een blonde Saison van 6.5% en werd gebrouwen met gerstemout, speltmout, 2 hopsoorten...

naam: Gooische Grape Ale IX NOIR (Cabaret NOIR) (Zo)
beschrijving: De eerste Grape Ale gebrouwen met geroosterde en zwarte mouten. En de Cabaret Noir druif van het Betuws Wijndomein. Koffie, chocola en kersen.

Amberkleurige Bière de Garde, Impérial - dus extra zwaar uitgevoerd. Bekroond met Zilveren medaille Brussels Beer Challenge. Verwarmend, alcoholisch maar door vergisting met saisongist niet plakkend zoet.
Een echt, ONDERGISTEND Schwarzbier (niet te verwarren met een Porter of Stout ;)) ondergistend en daardoor mooi doordrinkbaar.
Mooie Urtyp Pilsener, geïnspireerd op de traditionele Tsjechische pils. Ongefilterd, ongepasteuriseerd, fris gehopt.
Robert got canned, and we are pleased to introduce this blend as its less formal, more fun, little brother Bob.
Separated To A Degree – Winter ‘21/’22 is the fourth turn of our award winning mixed fermentation blend. We’ve blended this release with the same elaborate mixture of wild yeast...
Our current blend focuses on the Montmorency Cherry. The pressure we placed upon ourselves with using cherries stems.
Our first mixed fermentation beer brewed in the Brewpub, Rhubarb Gurnard is brewed with a touch of Mosaic, fermented with our house blend and lagered with Rhubarb juice.
The Otter is a pale ale Inspired by both American and British craft traditions. It combines exciting flavours with maximum pintability.
Funky Saison.
We call Warmouth a bootleg NEIPA, because it uses an obscure yet delicious yeast by Bootleg Biology.
aged 6 months
Double west coast collab Basqueland
Specially brewed for The Beer Experience festival (Heusden-Zolder, Belgium). Grist: Extra Pale Ale, Munich, wheat, oat and wheat flakes. Hops: Citra Cryo, Citra, Chinook. Yeast: East Coast Ale.
Pastry Sour avec 140g/L de Cerises
Un twist d'agrumes sur fond de saveurs tropicales. Le tout orchestré par une levure Kveik et son côté sec qui claque comme une piste de danse scandinave.
Rich, malty, and complex, we taste a medley of chocolate, dark fruit, and deep melanoidins.

Jam-packed with over 400 g. / L of orange, lemon, lime, and ginger juice, purée, and concentrate, this heavily fruited imperial sour is accentuated with vanilla, melding sweet, tart, zingy flavour with a surprisingly creamy texture.
We taste watermelon candy, blueberry, and a hint of mint
Triple dry hopped with Amarillo, Cascade, and Columbus. Finished with NZ Superdelic.
The Jungle King is our banana split-style Imperial Stout brewed with oats, wheat, dark brown sugar, and conditioned on banana, chocolate, and vanilla soft-serve.
Rollermania was dry hopped with Mosaic, Citra, Simcoe, and Cascade.
Golden ale brewed with 60% malted barley and 40% raw wheat. Spontaneously fermented and aged in neutral french oak barrels for 14 months.
Our base golden ale (60%/70% malted barley, 40%/30% raw wheat) spontaneously fermented and aged for 8 months in neutral french oak barrels.

A blend of 20 month and 30 month old golden ales. Spontaneously fermented and aged in neutral French oak barrels. Refermented on Honeyberries from Dundee Scotland. Bottle conditioned, unfiltered and unpasteurised.
Cister is an all-natural beer, made using only malted barley, Saaz hops, water, yeast and herbs grown on the grounds of the Herkenrode abbey itself.
With a 9% abv, a nice bitterness and a lightly cognac aftertaste. The beer is brewed using only 100% Saaz-Saaz hops, malted barley, water, yeast and herbs grown at the Herkenrode Abbey itself.
This amazing lager beer gives a refreshing full malt flavor, lightly bitter, with a sunny golden yellow colour and a solid white foam head.
Limburgse Witte has a light, fresh taste of citrus and a spicy touch of coriander, which combine to make it an outstanding thirst-quencher.
A massive imperial stout, inspired by the mighty Darkspace. A brew that is way out of this world.

stijl: Historical Beer - Gruit / Ancient Herbed Ale
beschrijving: A sour gruit ale with juniperberries and pinetips, brewed in honour of the sommersolstice celebration on the Holy Mountain.

A gruit barleywine inspired by a not yet released album of Paysage d'Hiver. A mixture of hops, pine-tips, heatherflowers, coriander, juniper berries and cloves was used to uplift this sweet barleywine beyond what you have experienced before. What this brew lacks in alcohol, is compensated by the solid body.
Brewed in conspiracy with Bölzer. 2nd batch
Low-alcohol version of the original Heralder. Only 13%, so expect a light, easy-drinking herbal honeybeer, to consume while raiding an English village under a nice spring sun.
A Kveik barleywine/ strong dark ale, brewed with smoked malts. This one is brewed in honour of Lamia Vox, a fantastic dark ambient artist.
A gruit braggot, made with hawthorn, sweet gale, coriander, juniper, pinetips and meadowsweet. Final gravity 1002, so pretty dry, but with a decent boost of raw honey.
In conspiracy with Bölzer : a flemish oud bruin, macerated on cranberries. Fermented with a mixture of lacto, brett and other yeasts over a period of 1,5 years
Spontaneous fermented beer blend with Cantine Vinci Marsala Brown Wine. Young beer for bottle Fermentation. Bottled on 10 March 2023.
Spontaneous fermented BF Beer with 1 gram Safran, on 13 liter beer, soaked in it for 3 days. 2005 Dow’s Nirvana Port added for natural bottle sugar. Bottled on 3 nov 23.

Spontaneous fermented beer blend with about 25% oxidized 1997 Domaine Belleville - Rully (La Pucelle 1st cru, Les Cloux 1st cru & Les Chauchoux) Wine. Young beer for bottle Fermentation. Bottled on 10 March 2023.

naam: If This Is Going To Be That Kind Of Party… (Za)
beschrijving: Spontaneous fermented beer blend with 1 kg/ll carbonic fermented grapes of which 50 % overripe boskoop glory and the other 50% different wine grapes Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and others. Bottled on 7 oktober 23 with sweet 1975 Muscat de Frontignan dessert wine (chateau de la Peyrade) for natural sugars for bottle refermentation.
Spontaneous fermented oak aged beer blend with Sandeman Dry Don (med. dry sherry) from somewhere between 1935 & 1950. Bottled on 2 July 2023.
Spontaneous fermented beer with 300 Gr/l fruit, 61% Pink Gooseberry, 19% white-, pink- & red currant & 10% Schaarbeekse krieken all from own garden. Bottled with PX Sherry on 20 Aug 2023.
Spontaneous fermented beer blend bottled on 2 juli 2023 with 1980 Kopke Quinta Lobata Ruby Port Wine and 1980 Quinta da Romaneira Ruby Port Wine for bottle refermentation.
Spontaneous fermented beer blend with Vat 22 Madeira Brown Wine. Young beer for bottle Fermentation. Bottled on 10 March 2023.
Spontaneous fermented beer blend with about 25% oxidized 1995 Paul Garaudet Bourgogne (Cote-d’Or) Chardonnay Wine. Young beer and a bit Vin Santo for bottle Fermentation. Bottled on 4 March 2023.
Wild beer 10gr/l coffee husks soaked in it for a week bottled with fresh brewed beer hydromel (mead) and moscatel wine for refermentation on 28 Nov 2022.
This gluten-free Buckwheat IPA combines a traditional Dutch grist of barley, buckwheat and oats, with modern American hop varities Chinook and El Dorado
Smoky Juniper Ale.
WHITE SAISON
With Hungarian olasz Rizling grapes.
1, 2 and 3 years old lambic with wild white peaches from Spain.
1,2 and 3 years old lambic Apricots from Ardeche in France. Blended together with riesling grapes harvest 2020 Mosel (Germany) & Italian muscat grapes 2021 Cinnamon (Ceylon)
Blend of cider & wine from Cannonau grapes. The Cannonau di Sardegna is a unique Sardean grape. These organic grapes are grown by our friends from Cantina Pusole in Sardinia.

Three varieties bio-quince from Pajottenland macerated for 5 months on lambik aged in wooden barrels. During the blending of the 3 barrels, a part of it was selected as pure quince lambiek, another part has been blended with cider: Kweepeerlambiek Cider Oogst 2020.
This Gueuze is a traditional blend of young and old lambics.

stijl: blend tussen kriek en muscat wijn

beschrijving: Double IPA van 7,5% met een melkerige body door de voluptueuze hoeveelheden boekweit en haver in de moutstorting. Nadien keihard getrashd met Citra, Idaho 7 cryo, Azacca cryo, Talus, en Galaxy. Om het bier even geweldig te vergisten als we er hop in dropten kozen we voor de Hornindal kveik gist om de vergisten op gang te knallen.

We Oaked our second version of Adelheid, with oakchips, soaked in Calvados, that was barrel-aged on a Brandy Barrel, from the distillery/brewery Het Aerts Paradijs from Koersel. A nice full alcoholic beer with a touch of apple, oak and spirit.

Lightly hopped pale ale with 100% Belgian hops (Soracchi Ace, Cascade and Magnum). The first beer from our own brewing installation in Hasselt is a complex-free drinkable beer with a nice hoppy bitterness.
It was time to brew again a West Coast IPA, for bitterness-lovers. This one contains Magnum, Citra, Centennial, Amarillo and Cascade hops.

With the name of the first granddaughter of brewer Geert, this beer stands for new life and love ! The perfect match between Jordy, Geert's son, and his wife Emma is equal to the perfect marriage between Raspberry and Basilicum !
Blend van Lambieken van 1 jaar en 4 jaar oud met Auxerrois Blanc, Pinot Blanc and Pinot Gris druiven
Blend van Lambieken van 1 jaar en 4 jaar oud met vlierbloesem
Blend van Lambieken van 1 jaar en 4 jaar oud met abrikoos en rabarber
Blend van Lambieken van 1 jaar en 4 jaar oud met abrikoos, kruidnagel, en een zweempje rabarber
Blend van Lambieken van 1 jaar en 4 jaar oud met weinberg nectarines
Fort-Da game of Loquat and Apricot in Lambik.
Blend of different ‘Lambikken’.
Blend of fresh figs, fresh dates and Lambik.
Blend of Lambik and Riesling Grapes.
Basis bier 35% ongemoute tarwe en 65% gemoute gerst. Spontane vergisting van paardenbloem.

Dit blonde spontane gistingsbier van 5.6% is een blend van jong en gerijpt bier met kweeperensap en vroegloons druivensap, één jaar gerijpt op het wijndomein Optimbulles. Dit bier kreeg de naam van een levensgenieter die als een rots in de branding de onstuimige golven trotseert.
